block.p: American League MINNESOTA TWINS--Signed LHP Jason Miller. NEW YORK YANKEES--Activated RHP Roger Clemens from the disabled list. Designated RHP Todd Erdos for assignment. TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Signed RHP Peter Bauer and SS Raul Tablado.

National League CINCINNATI REDS--Placed RHP Manny Aybar on the 15-day disabled list. Purchased the contract of RHP Andy Larkin from Louisville of the International League. ST. LOUIS CARDINALS--Placed C Eli Marrero on the 15-day disabled list. Called up C Keith McDonald from Memphis of the PCL. Transferred LHP Scott Radinsky from the 15- to the 60-day disabled list. SAN DIEGO PADRES--Activated RHP Donne Wall and RHP Woody Williams from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned RHP Carlos Almanzar and OF John Roskos to Las Vegas of the PCL.
